http.title: Depeche Mode Live Wiki
http.html:
Main Page

From Depeche Mode Live Wiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The Depeche Mode Live Wiki offers streams and downloads for all circulating recordings of Depeche Mode's extensive live career. Tour and concert information is also provided.

All circulating audio recordings are slowly being added, usually in batches of an entire tour. All circulating audio recordings from the 1980 Tour up to and including the 2001 "Exciter" Tour are currently streamable in your web browser and have lossless copies downloadable as ZIP archives. In addition, all circulating recordings from the 2003 "A Night With Martin L. Gore" tour and the 2015 "Angels & Ghosts" Tour are available. There are over 775 recordings currently available.

None of these recordings contain officially or commercially released tracks. Only recordings of independent origin or recordings which had analog or digital broadcasts are available for streaming and download here.

There is also an extensive interview section, with many interviews featuring full transcripts and audio streams where available, as well as background information regarding each interview. There are over 475 interviews currently available.

Set lists for most tour dates are provided as well, though information is lacking for many extremely early tour dates. Other media such as ticket scans, set list sheet photos, and pro-shot news snippets are also provided, where available. There is a list of dates with unconfirmed set lists, so if you can confirm the set list of a concert, please help out by contacting us!

Do you have any audio cassette or reel tapes, MiniDisc, DAT, 8mm/Hi8 video tapes, or VHS tapes containing live recordings, interviews, or demos? Please contact us - see Contributing.

Today in Depeche Mode history

  • 1980-04-17 Scamps, Southend-On-Sea, Essex, England, UK . . Categories: 1980 Tour | Unconfirmed setlist
  • 1986-04-17 Wembley Arena, London, England, UK . . Categories: 1986 Black Celebration Tour | Download available | Ticket scan
  • 2009-04-17 Diário de Notícias, Lisbon, Portugal . . Categories: Interviews
  • 2009-04-17 Inside Depeche Mode, FMQB, Cherry Hill, NJ, USA . . Categories: Interviews
  • 2009-04-17 La Saga, RTL, Paris, France . . Categories: Interviews

Dates with streamable recordings:

  • 1986-04-17 Wembley Arena, London, England, UK/Source 1 . . Categories: Audience recordings | Source | Streamable

Latest news

March 30, 2019
Added PLG's 1st gen recording from 1993-07-03 Parc Penfeld, Brest, France, upgrading the previous source; stream and download it here.
March 27, 2019
We have moved to a new domain: dmlive.wiki. All old links should still function, whether they are links to the wiki or forum. Please e-mail me if you find anything that doesn't work!
March 19, 2019
All recordings now have direct-download links instead of cumbersome torrent downloads, and streams & downloads have been moved to a new server. Please let me know of any dead download links, or streams that don't work anymore.
December 26, 2018
Added 9 soundboard tracks from 2001-05-30 Exciter Tour Rehearsals, Sound Design Studios, Santa Barbara, CA, USA. Stream and download them here.
December 25, 2018
Merry Christmas! Added a few recordings:
  • 1984-11-30 St. Jacobs Sporthalle, Basel, Switzerland/Source 1: undited pre-FM recording
  • 2009-04-xx Tour Of The Universe Tour Rehearsals: three variants; a pre-FM CD, a recording of an FM rebroadcast, and the original webstream capture
December 24, 2018
Added two master audience recordings from 2013-11-13 Leeds Arena, Leeds, England, UK:
  • Source 1: motr1912's very good audience recording
  • Source 2: Christopher Myatt's good audience recording
December 23, 2018
Renamed the "Demos & Studio Pre-Mixes" section to Demos & Studio Outtakes. Streams are now provided of all songs in their entirety (where available), including outtakes. A direct download is also provided containing FLAC versions of the songs, where available.
December 22, 2018
Added a second-generation audience recording from 1982-03-05 Rockola, Madrid, Spain, previously uncirculated. Stream and download it here.
December 21, 2018
Added Philippe Petit's good master audience recording from 1985-07-07 Werchter Festival, Werchter, Belgium. Stream and download it here.
December 20, 2018
Added Lars K's good master audience recording from 1993-12-20 Wembley Arena, London, England, UK. Stream and download it here.
December 19, 2018
Added Pictureshow Radio's good master audience recording from 1990-06-26 Blossom Music Center, Cuyahoga Falls, OH, USA. Stream and download it here.
December 18, 2018
Added Lars K's good master audience recording from 1993-12-18 Sheffield Arena, Sheffield, England, UK. Stream and download it here.
December 17, 2018
Added Lars K's good master audience recording from 1993-12-17 G-MEX Centre, Manchester, England, UK. Stream and download it here.
December 16, 2018
Added a very good audience recording from 1993-05-31 Garbsen, Hannover, Germany. Stream and download it here.
December 15, 2018
Added a master FM broadcast recording of the 3-song broadcast from 1981-08-26 Institute of Contemporary Arts, London, England, UK. Stream and download it here.

News archive

Guides

  • Converting FLAC to MP3
  • Burning audio CDs
  • Burning M4A recordings to a CD
  • Sample rate conversion

Recordings by type

  • Soundboard recordings
  • FM broadcasts
  • Audience recordings
  • Television broadcasts
  • Videos
    • External videos
  • Interviews
  • Streamable recordings
  • Songs
    • Early live-only songs
  • Compilations
    • 2013 Delta Machine Live - a compilation which includes most of the tracks performed on the Delta Machine tour, sourced from several webstreams.
    • Something Went Wrong - a compilation of Depeche Mode's live mistakes, glitches, technical problems and the like, spanning from 1980 to 2018.
  • Tour backing tapes: audio excerpts and information
    • 1987 - 1988 Music For The Masses Tour Backing Tapes
    • 1990 World Violation Tour Backing Tapes
    • 1993 Devotional Tour Backing Tapes
  • Demos & Studio Outtakes: full streams of demos and outtakes where available, and as much information as is known about them
    • Summer 1980 Demo Tape
    • Alan Wilder's 1984 "Some Great Reward" Demo Tape
    • Fake and misattributed tracks
  • Notable concerts
  • Soundchecks
  • Tour rehearsals
  • Master recordings
  • First generation recordings
  • Prolific tapers' recordings:
    • Elly Apfel's recordings

  • 2003 "A Night With Martin L. Gore" (Martin L. Gore solo)
  • 2015 "Angels & Ghosts" Tour (Dave Gahan & Soulsavers)
